koohiiStory1: Adroit: dextrous, deft, skillful. Snare is a little generic so I´ll use BEAR TRAP, with huge teeth cartoon style that snares you around the ankle. In the crafting of a bear trap, one must be particularly adroit. Otherwise they will become the victim of their down device.
koohiiStory2: To be adroit one must have mastered the crafting of snares.
words:
巧妙(こうみょう): ingenious, skillful, clever, deft
精巧(せいこう): elaborate, delicate, exquisite
巧み(たくみ): skill, cleverness
